title: (x) Nick Cave & The Bad Seeds: Abattoir Blues/The Lyre Of Orpheus - Hoefler Text {Mark S}
content:
Looking for the font used on Nick Caves new album, Abattoir Blues / The Lyre Of Orpheus.   
This is probably an easy one due to the distinctive ampersand, but does anyone know ?   
   
Thanks.   
   
(by the way, the album is great)   
   
 ![nick](http://web.archive.org/web/20050818175515im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/49595.jpg)
author: jem

comments.content: I think it's [Hoefler Text](http://web.archive.org/web/20050818175515/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/apple/hoefler-text/?PREFS_SET%5BRenderSize%5D=36&PREFS_SET%5BRenderString%5D=Nick+Cave+%26+The+Bad+Seeds). The ampersand is from the Italic and Hoefler Text also has swash characters that match (if you know how to access them).
